item.description:
Please join us for a healing ceremony (15-20 minutes of prayers and meditation) and potluck to support all of our members and those we know who are dealing with illness of any kind.  We all are in need of healing on some level.  By coming together, we can join our spirit and energy to bring light and peace where they are needed most.

Please call Theresa,  860-338-2922, or e-mail her, tcoving@gmail.com, if you plan on attending.  If you have any idea, pleaese let her know what you will bring for the potluck.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: Healing Ceremony and Potluck
